articles.description: RJ Barrett and Brandon Ingram provided plenty of offence for the Toronto Raptors in their third win of the young season, but it was rookie Collin Murray-Boyles who received plenty of the post-game praise.

articles.title: Soraya Martinez Ferrada elected mayor of Montreal

articles.title: Bruno Marchand wins second term as mayor of Quebec City
articles.description: As the incumbent mayor, Marchand had to defend his record against attacks from his opponents during the campaign.

articles.title: B.C. First Nation members vote in favour of treaty, moving toward self-governance
articles.description: The Kitsumkalum Nation has a population of about 825 members, and its territory spans the Skeena Region from Terrace to Prince Rupert

articles.title: Bruno Marchand swept back into the mayor's chair in Quebec City
articles.description: The vote brings the curtain down on a campaign that can best be described as a two-month roller-coaster ride for the candidates and people of the provincial capital.

articles.title: Breakthrough blood test finally confirms Chronic Fatigue Syndrome
articles.description: A team of scientists has developed a highly accurate blood test for Chronic Fatigue Syndrome. The test reads tiny DNA patterns that reveal the biological signature of the illness. For millions who’ve faced doubt and misdiagnosis, it’s a breakthrough that finally validates their experience — and may

articles.title: Albertans shouldn’t expect a ‘general strike’ anytime soon
articles.description: While Alberta labour groups promised swift retribution after the province forced teachers back to work, the head of the union admits a general strike won't happen overnight.

articles.title: Kevin Rose’s simple test for AI hardware — would you want to punch someone in the face who’s wearing it?
articles.description: "As an investor, you kind of have to not only say, okay, cool tech, sure, but emotionally, how does it make me feel? And how does it make others feel around me?"

articles.title: Former federal minister Soraya Martinez Ferrada elected mayor of Montreal
articles.description: Montreal's new mayor has pledged to tackle homelessness and to audit the city's bike paths, which have sparked a backlash from some drivers and business owners.

articles.title: Barrett, Ingram lead Raptors to win over Grizzlies
articles.description: RJ Barrett scored a game-high 27 points and Brandon Ingram added 26 to lead the Toronto Raptors to a 117-104 win against the Memphis Grizzlies on Sunday.

articles.title: Alzheimer’s might be powered by a broken sleep-wake cycle
articles.description: Disrupted sleep patterns in Alzheimer’s disease may be more than a symptom—they could be a driving force. Researchers at Washington University found that the brain’s circadian rhythms are thrown off in key cell types, changing when hundreds of genes turn on and off. This disruption, triggered by amy

articles.title: Quebecer Sylvan Adams donates $100M to rebuild Israeli hospital
articles.description: Canadian-Israeli billionaire Sylvan Adams has donated $100 million to rebuild an Israeli hospital that suffered extensive damage following an Iranian missile strike in June. Adams announced the donation to Soroka University Medical Center during an Israeli cabinet meeting on Sunday. The hospital, wh

articles.title: Jeremy Levi wins a 2nd term as mayor of Hampstead — by just 26 votes — after grueling campaign
articles.description: As the results rolled in Sunday night on Hampstead's website, Levi paced his kitchen while his wife, parents and three of his four young sons scrutinized the TV screen.
